playn.core
Interface Assets

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractAssets, AbstractCachingAssets
public interface Assets

Fetches and returns assets. This interface assumes that some or all assets are asynchronously loaded.

Method Summary
 Image getImage(String path)
          Return an Image, given a path to the image resource.
 int getPendingRequestCount()
          Return how many assets have not yet been loaded or errored out
 Sound getSound(String path)
          Return a Sound, given a path to the sound resource.
 void getText(String path, ResourceCallback<String> callback)
          Calls back with String, given a path to a text resource encoded with UTF-8.
 boolean isDone()
          Return true if all requested assets have been loaded or errored out, or false if there are assets remaining to be retrieved
 

Method Detail

             ResourceCallback<String> callback)
Calls back with String, given a path to a text resource encoded with UTF-8.

Parameters:
path - a path to the resource

isDone

boolean isDone()
Return true if all requested assets have been loaded or errored out, or false if there are assets remaining to be retrieved

Return how many assets have not yet been loaded or errored out
